pullRequest.title: fix(TBD-10095): Sqoop issue with parquet format with EMR 5.15(2.8.3)
pullRequest.bodyText:
Please check if the PR fulfills these requirements

 The commit(s) message(s) follows our guidelines ?
 Unit tests for the Java changes have been added (for bug fixes / features) ?
 TUJ for the JavaJet changes have been added (for bug fixes / features) ?
 Docs have been added / updated (for bug fixes / features) ?
 The new code does not introduce new technical issues

What is the current behavior? (You can also link to an open issue here)
TBD-10095
What is the new behavior?
Jar loading order fised
BREAKING CHANGE
If this PR contains a breaking change, please describe the impact and migration
path for existing applications.
If not please remove this section.
Other information:

nodes.bodyText: What is the diff between parquet-sqoop-1.4.7.jar and sqoop-1.4.7.jar ?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -298,9 +298,9 @@
         <!-- Sqoop libraries -->
         <libraryNeeded
             context="plugin:org.talend.hadoop.distribution.emr5150"
-            id="parquet-sqoop-1.4.7.jar"
-            name="parquet-sqoop-1.4.7.jar"
-            mvn_uri="mvn:org.talend.libraries/parquet-sqoop-1.4.7/6.0.0"/>
+            id="sqoop-1.4.7.jar"
+            name="sqoop-1.4.7.jar"
+            mvn_uri="mvn:org.apache.sqoop/sqoop/1.4.7"/>

nodes.bodyText: You changed the condition from equal PARQUET to not equal AVRO. Is it equivalent. Don't we have other txt formats ?

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    <!-- jackson jars are defined localprovider plugin.xml -->
          
          
            
                    <!-- jackson jars are defined inside the localprovider plugin.xml -->
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1986,9 +1986,34 @@
                 id="SQOOP-LIB-EMR_5_15_0_LATEST"
                 name="SQOOP-LIB-EMR_5_15_0_LATEST">
             <library id="commons-lang3-3.5.jar"/>
+        </libraryNeededGroup>
+
+        <!-- Sqoop Avro group -->
+        <libraryNeededGroup
+                description="Sqoop Avro libraries for EMR 5.15.0"
+                id="SQOOP-AVRO-LIB-EMR_5_15_0_LATEST"
+                name="SQOOP-AVRO-LIB-EMR_5_15_0_LATEST">
             <library id="avro-sqoop-uber.jar"/>
         </libraryNeededGroup>
 
+        <!-- Sqoop Text group -->
+        <!-- jackson jars are defined localprovider plugin.xml -->

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    <!-- jackson jars are defined localprovider plugin.xml -->
          
          
            
                    <!-- jackson jars are defined inside the localprovider plugin.xml -->
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1986,9 +1986,34 @@
                 id="SQOOP-LIB-EMR_5_15_0_LATEST"
                 name="SQOOP-LIB-EMR_5_15_0_LATEST">
             <library id="commons-lang3-3.5.jar"/>
+        </libraryNeededGroup>
+
+        <!-- Sqoop Avro group -->
+        <libraryNeededGroup
+                description="Sqoop Avro libraries for EMR 5.15.0"
+                id="SQOOP-AVRO-LIB-EMR_5_15_0_LATEST"
+                name="SQOOP-AVRO-LIB-EMR_5_15_0_LATEST">
             <library id="avro-sqoop-uber.jar"/>
         </libraryNeededGroup>
 
+        <!-- Sqoop Text group -->
+        <!-- jackson jars are defined localprovider plugin.xml -->
+        <libraryNeededGroup
+                description="Sqoop Text libraries for EMR 5.15.0"
+                id="SQOOP-TEXT-LIB-EMR_5_15_0_LATEST"
+                name="SQOOP-TEXT-LIB-EMR_5_15_0_LATEST">
+            <library id="sqoop-1.4.7.jar"/>
+        </libraryNeededGroup>
+
+        <!-- Sqoop Text group -->
+        <!-- jackson jars are defined localprovider plugin.xml -->

commit.message: Merge branch 'fix/TBD-10095_jar_loading_order' of https://github.com/Talend/tbd-studio-se into fix/TBD-10095_jar_loading_order
